name: Space Shooter (zuwei)
description:
Space Shooter is a 2d shoot em' up based on space themed elements inspired by early arcade style shooter games. You are a fighter pilot sent by the government to defend against spaceships from another galaxy that are attacking earth. Be the brave hero that humanity deserves and fight your way to defeat the final boss!

How To Play

Move your ship around and shoot the hazards to get score points. Getting hit by the hazards or letting them pass you will cause you to lose health. You lose when your health becomes 0. During the game there are powerups that can be collected such as speed boost, special attacks or health packs.

Controls

Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys

Attack - Space Bar

This is the only a prototype of the game. As it gets updated the game will become more complete and more features will come.
